Label layout

Source: R/label_layout.R
label_layout.Rd

Generate labels options

Usage

label_layout(
  data = NA,
  size,
  border_width = NA,
  border_color = "black",
  background = NA,
  units = "cm"
)

Arguments

data

data frame to build the labels

size

label size (numeric: c(10, 2.5))

border_width

border width (numeric: 0.5)

border_color

border color (string: "transparent")

background

background color (string: "transparent")

units

units for the label options (string: "cm")

Value

data frame

Examples


label <- label_layout(size = c(10, 2.5)
                   , border_color = "red"
                   , border_width = 1
                   ) %>% 
                 label_print()
